ygData.subject: Re: Hail
ygData.msgSnippet: As a reminder, you can get FS weapons in cazic thule, they are better than regular weapons, and players will sell real cheap because any of the good races
ygData.messageBody:
As a reminder, you can get FS weapons in cazic thule, they are better than regular weapons, and players will sell real cheap because any of the "good" races and the casters can't sell anywhere near by. FS sells for 4 pp at stores, so you can offer that and have your choice of weapons.

Salr D'Taynkk
Dark Warrior of The Kith
Veeshan

>>> "Jones, Brian" <brian.jones@...> 5.24.99 9:38:39 AM >>>
From: "Jones, Brian" <brian.jones@...>

You can get bronze weapons from Gnoll Nobles and Dervishes,
much better than the tarnished sword. You can also shell out
about 5 pp for a regular sword. I paid 5pp for my Broadsword
and it works much better than the rusty and tarnished versions
(almost 1 more in damage and -2 in delay).

Angarth, Warrior of the 15th Tier
"Periissem ni periisem"

> the
